radiographic_examinations.findings: Left hydronephrosis and a cyst in the left upper pole

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the chest and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Right axillary lymphadenopathy, subcarinal mass (5.6 cm in diameter), superior mediastinal lymphadenopathy, extensive mesenteric, retroperitoneal, periceliac, peripancreatic, periportal, bilateral iliac, and right inguinal lymphadenopathy, enhancing exophytic lobulated mass (2.5 cm) in left kidney

radiographic_examinations.date: After initial three cycles of treatment
radiographic_examinations.findings: Resolution of diffuse lymphadenopathy and decreased uptake in bone marrow and spleen, persistent foci of uptake in left humeral and left femoral necks
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked progression of disease in bone marrow and increased intensity in abdominal lymph nodes after three additional cycles of treatment
